name: Dorka Balla-Johnson
text: I really enjoy their gluten free pizza crust. It's made fresh in-store and truly some of the best Columbus has to offer. Highly recommend

name: Fred Roeder
text:
The BEST pizza that I have ever eaten whilst working in Columbus, OH.
This is some seriously good stuff folks.
I will definitely be back for more!!!

name: Laty Chaykeo
text: 4 stars for great fast food chain for pizzas; has vegetarian options, sauce and crust is pretty tasty.  I would love to see some organic and non-gmo options here.  That would make this place my go to for pizzas!  Although, this place could improve on customer service and cleanliness of the facility.

name: Caitlin Kleinpaste
text: Blaze Pizza does a fantastic job of handling food allergies and restrictions. We had a group with several severe food allergies and no one had a reaction to our pizzas!  I was particularly impressed that they provided vegan/dairy free cheese; my friend said it was the best dairy free pizza he's ever had.

name: Brad Kilgore
text: We had great build your own pies. Love the large amount of choices and service was friendly and quick. Thanks!

name: Erika Murray
text: My first time at blaze pizza! Great topping selections, really good deal for a build your own pizza with unlimited options. Fresh ingredients, fast service, and baked perfectly with a crunchy crust, but soft dough inside! Will definitely recommend to any pizza lovers or anyone looking for a new good food experience!

name: Desserae Bailey
text: Great customer service! We hadn't been to Blaze in a while and the "Sauce Boss" took the time to explain the menu and pricing. We will definitely be back!

name: Emily Ishmael
text: Consistently good pizza, but they seem a little short staffed due to covid. The staff is friendly and helpful, but i was a tiny bit concerned that one person took his mask off to talk to us. Overall great service and great CYO pizza.

name: Elisha Provenzale
text: Omgsh! It was so delicious! Every bite of my pizza was heaven!  And their smore pie cookie tasted just like a smore! I can't wait to go back! This was me and my son's first time eating there. He got a free pizza coupon in the mail! They are ‚Ä¶More

name: Linda Rupert
text: Over all,  I would give 5 stars.  I love Blaze pizza.  They do a great job of making my order and don't skimp on the  toppings.  I am allergic to cow's milk/ cheese,  and they offer goat's cheese, which means i can still have pizza.  ‚ù§ ‚Ä¶More

name: Lanae Carter
text: Very tasty, the pizza was grease free and the staff was nice while taking my order.

name: Karen Lane
text: I was very pleased with the service and professionalism of the crew at the time I was there.

name: Leann Griffith
text: Very good pizza! I went because they had Keto crust and it was delicious.

name: cory sebach
text: One of my favorite places to eat! Great service and great food!

name: Luke Knapke
text: Great place. It's essentially the pizza version if chipotle. They have a ton of really fun ingredients thought and there's something there for everyone. Good atmosphere and they have these lemonades that are super good.

name: Beverly Rose
text: Gross pizza .no flavor. Waste of money ...Dirty dusty blah atmosphere...

name: Hector Robles
text: Davonte is exceptional. He's welcoming and brings an awesome atmosphere to the dining experience and I can tell he's a great a team player. This is a great location.

name: Sherrome Busby
text: First time there and it was great. Good price and the food was very good

name: Richie B
text: Excellent low carb options! We will be back.

name: Adam Tcg
text: Delicious, surprisingly healthy pizzas made to order. Staff always makes me feel welcome.

name: Kyla Pipes
text: Great pizza for the price. Love the variety and the options available for different dietary needs. Had recently placed an order for delivery and was delivered the wrong pizza. Unfortunately, they do not answer the phone but they quickly got ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawn Mash
text: Pretty good tasting pizza fresh!

name: Juergen Pum
text: Not very clean food everywhere... Specified only served when wearing mask but half the employees where not wearing the masks (or under their chins), pizza was almost cold eating it at the store...

name: Jonathan Coakley
text: It's practically the Chipotle of pizza. Prices are fair for a pizza place and it's really fast for baking pizza. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because when you get the regular crust, it may be easy for the bottom of the crust ‚Ä¶More

name: Dal Taylor
text: No mask no service. We don't care what the reason. Pizza crust over cooked. Pizza tasteless.  I'm not impressed.

name: Janasha Merchant
text: If you love homemade pizza this is a great place to try !

name: Gerald Binion
text: Great food and service ..the price was right and everyone left feeling satisfied

name: Jennifer Hudson
text: Columbus finest place to go for a quick healthy snack/ lunch.  Must try Blood Orange Lemonade!

name: Douglas Baz
text: Blaze has great pizza. I like their regular crust, it's not too thin or thick. The combination of toppings is endless. Try the pesto sauce mixed with the garlic alfredo instead of tomato sauce for a delicious treat.

name: Jennifer Grant
text: Ordered from Blaze Pizza Worthington OH thru Postmates at 4:33 pm with priority ordering. The Postmate waited an hour and 45 minutes at the store for a pizza that was promised in 22-35 minutes with priority speed. When I cancelled the order ‚Ä¶More

name: Ahmad Abu baker
text: Very friendly staff, and the pizza is so delicious

name: Kelsie Dunbar
text: Great price for quick pizza. They have vegan cheese and chorizo. Love the arugula topping choice and they offer large sizes now.

name: Claire Chen
text: First time to try it on pi day. This pizza costed me $3.14 and I put everything I want on it! It was the best pizza I had in Columbus.

name: King David

name: Lily Shahar Kunning
text: We ordered them through Postmates. The restaurant mislabeled a pizza box and we ended up getting a wrong pizza. They refused to correct the mistake, deliver the correct one, or offer a refund. ‚Ä¶More

text: First time trying this place. Create my own pizza was excellent !!! Thank you. I'm own a diet where I can't have items that contain potassium. The items I chose don't have potassium.

name: Matt Logue

name: Jen B

text: Good that you could choose your own toppings, sauce, etc. but the service I received was really bad. The guy putting pizza in the oven did not want to explain anything and was grumpy.

text: Kind of an odd location to get to but the pizza is very good. The topping selection was good but it took a little while to put all the toppings on. I believe it was someone new who was learning though so I can't complain. It was a good size portion for a very reasonable price

name: john childress
text: The keto crust is awesome unlimited toppings must try the pesto finish.

text: One of the best pies!! They make "it your way", just tell them how to make the thin crust pizza pie! An Lebron James investor.

name: Patrick Hayden
text: Great ingredients making great pizzas at good price. No, I dont work there, it was just a good pizza, quick, at a good price.

name: Evan Fouch

name: Debbie Phillips

text: I wish the sauce were a little tastier tastier but in general the pizza is really delicious. I went here for lunch during work and there was about a 5 minute wait during the business lunch hour. The staff was very friendly. I'd return. I like the "New York" style pizza.

name: scott spears
text: Great place to get a pizza fast and it's tasty too.

name: Amber Hamilton
text: It's very good and the ingredients are fresh but you should ask for your pizza to be extra crispy if you want any kind of crispy crust.

name: Becky Smith

text: Good pizza, done right in from of your face, you can choose ingredients and it's put into an open fire stove. Vegan options! Only complaint is it's 1 size of pizza only. No other options, just 1 medium size looking pizza for everyone. But it's still worth a try.

name: J Wong

name: Bill Blinn
text: There's only one size of pizza (or you can choose a half pizza). You supervise the building of the pizza and then they cook it. There are high-end pizza shops nearby, but Blaze is a great choice for a quick, modestly priced pie.

name: Lena Wu
text: The staff.are friendly and funny. It's good pizza at a good price.

name: Jeffrey Small
text: really good reasonable prices very clean in side

name: Ricky Reagan Jr
text: I've been doing keto on and off for a couple years now and decided to try their keto pizza. I got spicy red sauce, bacon, pepperoni, banana peppers and tomatoes and it was pretty good.

name: ab cdb
text: They close the doors before 10 PM. idk what kind place runs their business like that. If the posted hours say until 10PM EST, the door SHOULD stay open. Keep in mind, i was picking up an online order.

text: One of my very favorite spots for pizza. Fresh ingredients and friendly people make a great experience. Good value too!

name: Mark Cameron

text: Went to Blaze Pizza for my first time tonight. Romy was fantastic! He was extremely patient and very helpful and building my pizza. My pizza is perfect!! I think I may have found my new favorite place to get pizza!!

name: Tiffany Howard
text: Great tasting fast service pizza. We had just the simple cheese pizza but it tasted fantastic. Tried the BLT Cobb was pretty good but didn't really like all of the bleu cheese in it.

name: Kenneth Moody
text: Loved it! The topping were fresh and the dough was good. I love that it is cooked by a real fire oven. The price was good and the chocolate sea salt cookies were fantastic. They have a unique selection of lemonades and other drinks. Everyone was really friendly!

name: Christine Russell
text: Who doesn't like a great pizza? The toppings you love and as much as you like! And in less than 4 minutes it is ready. It's enough to share and it's less than $9.00. Hard to beat a deal like that.

name: Lindsey Jacobs
text: Pizza was amazing. Service was fast. Definitely recommend!

name: Sean Grisez
text: Excellent pizzeria with a casual atmosphere. The pizzas were fantastic!  I recommend to plan for 2/3 of a pizza per adult.  They are about the size of a standard medium pizza, but with a thin crust.

name: Sheree Campbell
text: Great atmosphere, friendly staff! Make a pizza your way. Or choose from the menu.

name: Danielle Watkins
text: Absolutely love this pizza.  Reminded me of a pizza place in Washington D.C.  The employees were great!! They were friendly and very informative on their product.

name: Tamara Basile
text: My kids love this place. They can pick what they want on their pizza and the woodfire flavor is great! And, you don't have to eat your crust thin. They can make it thicker, which I prefer. I like that you can switch things up and add and delete add you like. Plus it's all made fresh right in front of you

text: Ordering was quick, as was the pizza. As usual with these pizza places, the crust is thin and the bottom had a nice crisp. What I really didn't like was the use of cherry tomatoes instead of sliced, but overall, everything was okay.

text: Its was -ok- pricey for what you get. I got "5" pepperoni s on my pizza.......5! The staff was great , out of coke, crust had a good taste, cheese had a after taste. name: Carl Reher
text: There was no flavor to the barbecue chicken pizza.

text: I love this pizza place. They have gluten free and dairy free options. AWESOME

text: I love all the topping options, but I paid $2 extra for thick crust and it was still pretty thin. I'm not asking for deep dish or anything, but compared to Dominoes (my favorite) the thick crust was about half as thick. I probably won't return again until I hear they have true thick crust pizza.

text: I love that they have vegan options! Super friendly, super fast, and the food is super delicious!

name: Michael Murphy
text: It's not bad, but kind of pricey for what you get. A decent deal if you can find one of their buy one get one free coupons. I still prefer MOD pizza best out of the various quick fired pizza brands.

name: Frank Malone
text: Make your own but don't pile on the toppings. Simple / uncomplicated the best option!

text: Folks are always friendly and the quality is consistent high.

name: Michael Hoffer
text: Great service and food! I loved how they were generous with the toppings.

text: The food is great and service is quick.  Wonder about the prices but have nothing to compare it to!

name: Mary Scott
text: I really like Blaze Pizza. Every time I go there and order my pizza I'm never disappointed. I I am always happy with what I get Blaze.

name: Brandon Cole

The pizza here is amazing. They have a good selection of toppings and the food is always fresh.

name: Chad Harris
text: Great food, awesome people. So glad I found this place. I recommend skipping the salad and do a build your own.

name: Allison Gardner

text: My pizza was perfect I live 2 hours away but I wish my city had a blaze! My husband and I are complete opposites and Blaze allowed up to both enjoy our own pizza at a reasonable price
